description: The app for learning Moe-Kawaii Anime-Style drawings, "Animerious's" big update is finally here! ・Newly designed UI ・Bug fixes ・Newly added "Pro Shelf" tutorials ・Newly added "Beginner Shelf" tutorials ・New "Share in Facebook and get it free" tutorial added Animerious is a tutorial app that allows users to study various Japanese anime style illustration production techniques used by professional illustrators. In addition to a plethora of detailed, easy to understand image commentaries, the app also includes production processes shown on video, making this an app characterized by the ability to experience professional production techniques in meticulous detail. The Animerious app also has enhanced usability, including an intuitive operation flow that lets the user transfer quickly to each production step, and the ability to bookmark favorite production steps. All production processes from illustration character creation and sketching to painting are included in each tutorial so users can fully enjoy lots of professional techniques. We recommend Animerious for professionals as well as people who want to start doing digital illustration from now on and people interested in paintings!! We are planning to add more high quality tutorials in the future too. Support language: English, Japanese ★★★If you have any requests regarding the tutorials, please drop us a comment in the review! We'll be updating soon and we're keen to hear opinions from you!★★★
release_text: ・Newly designed UI ・Bug fixes ・Newly added "Pro Shelf" tutorials ・Newly added "Beginner Shelf" tutorials ・New "Share in Facebook and get it free" tutorial added

description: Formerly known as Find A Starbucks, relaunched with a new name and logo after receiving a Cease and Desist from Starbucks. Update: Support has been added for Dunkin' Donuts, Peets Coffee, Tim Hortons, Caribou Coffee, Seattle's Best, Coffee Bean and Au Bon Pain. Nutritional Information is now also available from the menu. If you love Starbucks coffee then this is the Starbucks finder app for you. It’s real easy to use and will help you find a Starbucks store that is close to your current location. Usage: On start the application tries to determine your current location using either gps or network (wifi + 3g). Once your location is determined a default search will be performed which will return the 10 closest Starbucks stores to your location. Using the phone menu button you can bring up the menu options to search, move the map to your location, clear the results, etc. Using this search option or the search button brings up the search dialog. On this dialog you can filter your search based on stores with certain features such as drive-through or open 24 hours. Features: * Search by: o using your current location either gps or network o search by address you enter * When searching you can specify o Stores open 24 hours o Stores with drive-throughs o Stores that accept mobile pay * Contains Map and List views o The map view shows your current location and the location of the Starbucks stores. Tapping on a location shows a popup with more information. o The list view shows information about each Starbucks store. o Information shown includes + address + phone number + hours if available and also whether the store is currently open. + features such as mobile pay, drive-through, wifi, etc o Clicking on either a map popup or a store in the List will direct you to Google Maps with turn by turn navigation to the store o Long clicking on a store in the List will call the store (maybe if the hours aren’t available). Permissions Used: * Fine and Coarse Location - to determine your location * Internet - used to retrieve map and starbucks data * read phone state and identity - used by ad network Please email for support before leaving a negative review. Starbucks, the Starbucks logo are (c) Starbucks Corporation. Coffee Finder is not affiliated with or endorsed by the Starbucks Corporation.

Life is difficult. Decisions don't have to be. Fuck the Decision removes all worry from making decisions. Simply populate the list with all possibilities you have in mind and Decision Blast delivers a random decision. From simple to complex decisions, the choice no longer lies solely on you. Warning - Do not add any thing to the list that is illegal. Fuck the Decision does not force you to do any thing; you are not under any pressure or binding of law to perform or act upon the decision the application provides. The app and its creator is not liable for any mishaps that may arise from doing what Fuck the Decision suggests. Fuck the Decision does not know what the best thing for you is. Only you think you know this.

アーティスト名、アルバム名、曲名といった楽曲情報を取得可能です。 カーナビゲーション内部の楽曲データベースに、楽曲情報が収録されていないCDを再生する場合、楽曲情報を表示することは出来ませんが、当アプリケーションを利用することでデータベースに無い楽曲情報も表示することが可能になります。 本アプリにて取得できる曲情報は、Rovi Corporationの楽曲データベースを使用しています。 スマートフォンの通信によりRovi Corporationの楽曲データベースを引き当てし、対応カーナビゲーションとBluetooth接続することにより、対応カーナビゲーション側に楽曲情報を表示します。 ■対象カーナビゲーション KENWOOD 彩速ナビゲーションモデル ・MDV-Z702W ・MDV-Z702 ・MDV-X702W ・MDV-X702 ・MDV-X802L ・MDV-Z701W ・MDV-Z701 ・MDV-X701W ・MDV-X701 ・MDV-Z700W ・MDV-Z700 OEMモデル ・CA9K2（C9K2-V6-650/A9K2-V6-650） ・DKX-A800 ■対応Android OS 2.2, 2.3, 4.0 ■対応言語 KENWOOD Music Info.は、日本語のみ対応しています。 ■ご注意 ・全ての端末での正常な動作を保証するものではございません。 ・楽曲データベース上に存在する楽曲情報の取得を行います。全てのCD楽曲情報を引き当てできることは保証できません。 ・スマートフォン側のBluetooth設定方法に関しましては、お持ちの端末メーカー様/キャリア様にお問合せください。

description: Marketing plan and strategy app for people who are looking to learn to promote either a product, service, or a business. This app will make you a marketing pro! You will learn to create a great marketing plan and have a great marketing strategy to help you grow your business. The app offers an ability to ask marketing questions about an existing marketing plan, or your strategy and chat with a marketing expert to help you improve your marketing plan and your overall marketing strategy. Or if you are just starting to write your marketing plan, you can get advice and various marketing strategy tips. Just ask and we will be happy to assist you! The app offers numerous tutorials on how to create a great marketing plan and marketing strategy. This apps also gives you the ability to chat with a marketing expert and get help creating your marketing plan and marketing strategy. We encourage you to ask questions and get help from marketing experts who can coach you. All questions are answered by an entrepreneur experienced in both offline marketing and online marketing. Your marketing plan and strategy questions can range across topics such as SEO, SEM, local service advertising, email marketing, PR and more. Answers to theoretical questions are available as well. - All live marketing plan questions are answered by an experienced entrepreneur within 48 hours but often in under one hour in over 80% of cases. - The app also offers a number of small business marketing articles and tutorials on topics of SEO, SEM, social media marketing, and other techniques. We will continue to add articles to the app every month. The current set of articles covers topics such as: 1) Small business marketing fundamentals 2) Internet startup marketing 3) Small business marketing strategy for a local service with SEO, SEM and local business search 4) How to quickly set up a professional website for your business, and tips for marketing your business on the web with your website. 5) Internet marketing tips and strategy Visit the Problemio website at http://www.problemio.com for more apps and information.

SUPERBUZZER Quiz Game, the best real-time multiplayer trivia game! Challenge your friends or random players and beat them with your knowledge – available on Android, Facebook, iPhone or iPad. SUPERBUZZER Quiz Game really makes you want to buzz! Download the best trivia game now! Speed, strategy, excitement – there’s no end to the challenges that await you here! Every game consists of a maximum of 3 rounds. 1. Round: Survive the “Point Race” against the other players. 2. Round: Win “The Sprint” to qualify for the final. 3. Round: The “Final Fight”, where you knock your opponent out with a series of right answers to win the game and quiz your way up to the Masters! It's time to buzz! Download the best trivia game now! Key Features: LIVE MULTIPLAYER Play against real players in real time! Smash the buzzer before the others do and lead the game. Play private games with friends or compete with opponents from all over the world! WIDE RANGE OF QUESTIONS AND TOPICS Quiz yourself with thousands of questions across 70 different topics (history, geography, celebrities, film & TV, science and many more). CROSS-PLATFORM EXPERIENCE Play in real-time against friends and random opponents, regardless of whether they use the Android, Facebook, iPhone or iPad versions of SUPERBUZZER Quiz. WEEKLY COMPETITIONS & LEADERBOARDS New competitions start every Monday. Compete against your friends and take the lead in the high-score lists. Free games are the reward for the best quizzers! Compare yourself with your friends and SUPERBUZZER players all over the world in our high-score lists. Become the BUZZER CHAMPION! UNLOCK A VARIETY OF TROPHIES AND BADGES There are over 100 trophies waiting to be unlocked. The more you win, the more you can decorate your profile with new titles, buzzers, gloves, and themes. EARN NEW GAMES When you reach a new level, a new game is unlocked – and the same for every new friend you add. Are you a member of our Facebook community? Join us at https://www.facebook.com/Superbuzzer If you are having technical issues or if you have any questions, we're here to help. Please send us an email to: support@thesuperbuzzer.com or use our support website: http://support.gerwinsoftware.com Please Note: SUPERBUZZER Quiz Game is completely free to play, however you can buy credits for real money. You may control in-app purchases made within this app using the password settings explained in the Google Play help center.
release_text: ✔ Keyboard improvements ✔ Thousands of new questions for all ages, to play with friends, foes, family and Quizzers from all over the world!

description: Street Driving is a car simulator with great dynamic gameplay. It features realistic arcade car controls: device tilt and pedals! Can you drive in this heavy traffic? Become the master of the steering wheel! Control your car with accelerometerl, acceleration and brake pedals. Show that driving a car in 3d is really for you. In travel mode just drive as far as you can and get rewarded for distance, speed, close takeovers. Watch your fuel level and collect additional canisters. There is no time limit - go as far as you can. Police mode: Police mode gives you opportunity to bring law and order to the streets. Chase criminals and take them down. But beware! They will return fire. Buy additional guns and use them! Collect additional ammo cartridges and do not forget to reload your gun. * car driving experience as seen in popular endless car or police driving games * no parking this time * the game scene is endless - how far will you get * police mode - chase the criminals! * enjoy the realistic on-screen controls * it might be as thrilling as a driving exam! Are you a fan of car driving or parking games? If you want to try something different than parking cars then parking buses or maybe parking trucks, this one is for you! If you are good at parking try some driving for a change. Show your driving skills be fast and agile! Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/piotr_klimko

description: Fartners - The Social Network For Your Ass Tired of all your good farts going to waste? Feeling sad because no one appreciates your fartastic farts? Well, feel sad no more. Fartners lets you share farts sounds with your friends, discover others’ farts, follow Fartners just like you, comment, like, rate, play, re-fart and much more. (Currently you can only share your fart sounds, smell detector - coming soon!) Try our fun farting features: Fart Feed – A feed that sounds funny, filled with all your fart activities in one place. Ranks - Fart your way up the ladder of ranks to become the ultimate Fartner by gaining XP for sharing, liking, rating and playing. Featuring ranks like: • Fart Ninja • Sergeant Pooper • Gas Giant • Sir Fartsalot And much more Achievements - Earn up to 60 achievements (more coming soon!) and brag about them to your friends and family. Fart scores and rating system - A sophisticated algorithm that analyzes the sound your fart and produces a score and rating. Featuring ratings like: • What the FART was THAT?! • Fartastic • Beautiful • Fail and more Top charts - The place to find the highest ranked farts and the most talented Fartners in the world. Fart recognition game - Spot the fart noise by the way it sounds and looks, achieve high scores and earn the “Fart watcher” achievement. Fart composer and visualizer - Record your fart sounds, name them, tag them, see how they look and share them with your followers. Notifart© - Your followers will be notified instantly whenever you fart. Hardcore users - Use the fart as the notification sound. Fart bomb - Use any fart sound as a whoopee cushion and prank your friends with a timed farting sound, just leave your phone next to them and leave the premises unsuspiciously. A lot of new great features are coming soon...!

" - appsafari.com (4/5) "Despite the two decades I’ve lived, no vertical scrolling shooter has captivated me like iFighter." - Jeff Effendi, AppGamer.net (9/10) "With its rocking original soundtrack and crisp graphics, this vertical 2D shooter has zoomed in and blasted the competition out of the sky." - AppSmile.com (5-Dimple) As the ace pilot of the airforce in WWII, your mission is to destroy the secret weapon prototypes of the evil force. The perfect app for those missionary moms, bishops, youth leaders, best friends or just about anyone who has a Mormon missionary serving anywhere in the world. This app lets you keep track of your Elders and Sisters and allows you to see how much time they have left. This app lets you keep track of as many missionaries as you'd like! Note: This app is in the beginning stages of development. Many new features including integration with Google Maps, Facebook and other social media sites will be coming soon! Other features include: -Keep track of missionaries by storing their information -View missionary's departure and return date and the mission that they are serving in -Set areas and companions for each missionary -Send an email directly from app to missionary -Countdown feature to countdown to the day your missionary leaves -Count-up feature to keep track of how many days your missionary has been serving -Countdown feature to countdown to the day your missionary returns home -Set a weekly reminder to write your missionaries

description: Bursting with an incredible 7 sound banks, totalling over 350 electronic music samples. Beat Boss lets you quickly create amazing electronic music. It's fun to use and requires no musical knowledge. Just tap the sound pads to create your own drum loops, bass lines, percussion, sound fx and a huge range of electronic music sounds. The sampler gives you the power to loop and perform on 54 playable sounds pads. It's the perfect app for electronic music dj’s and producers looking to jam out ideas and layer or blend sounds into a mix. Select from a continually evolving bank of professional EDM samples, including: *Dubstep *Deep House *Progressive House *Drum and Bass *Techno *Trance *Technical Grime (dubstep II) Press up to 11 pads at once and loop as many pads as desired. Full app, no adverts. Features: *54 professionally produced sounds for each genre. Including drum loops, risers, fx, bass lines, synth lines and percussion *Use the loop feature and stop having to push so many buttons at once. *Conveniently organise sounds by altering the pad colours, making your Beat Boss distinct. ★★ Community★★ For the latest updates and to connect to the F.T.M. community: - Search and like Fresh Touch Media on Facebook - Follow @freshtouchapps on Twitter Tutorial videos and more music apps: http://www.freshtouchmedia.com Check out our other electronic music apps: Bass Drop Trap Bass Drop Drum and Bass Bass Drop Dubstep

Welcome to this new game experience. Did you enjoy playing hide and seek with your friends when you were young? Then download this app and watch how child and technology experience an completely new game together. Hide one of these four (hiding)buddies and let your child or friend look for them in a fun and interactive way. Every character (buddy) has its own characteristics that you'll have to discover while playing. That's why finding your buddies will be a new experience every single time. Teach children (and grandfathers and grandmothers) play and rediscover hide-and-seek in a new way! Play hide and seek as never before. Unique features are: Gaming fun for young and old Playable from 2 years and up Every hiding buddy has its own recognizable characteristics 2 difficulty levels Completely in the English and Dutch language Big and colorful buttons making interaction very simple "Hide and seek" play it with your friends. hide and seek can also be played on tablet or phone.

app_name: 楽天レシピ～献立・料理・レシピ検索のクッキングサポートアプリ
description: ▼▽▼無料レシピアプリの完全版！▼▽▼ 主婦のアイディアが詰まった約100万レシピの中から人気レシピだけでなく、管理栄養士が作成した献立やレシピまとめが無料で閲覧できます。 楽天レシピのアプリで料理を投稿すると楽天スーパーポイントを貰えます！ 【楽天レシピの主な特徴】 「人気順」並び替え機能が無料で使えます。カテゴリー内で、レシピを並び替えると、今人気の献立が一目でわかります。 お肉、野菜を使った簡単な料理やお弁当から、スパイスやハーブ、ワインを使用した上級者向け献立・作り方まで、様々なシーンでのあなたのクッキングライフを支援するアプリです。 シチューやパスタ、カレー、お好み焼きなどの料理からケーキ、アイスクリーム、おはぎなどのお菓子スイーツまで、選べるメニューも沢山あります。 ■こんなあなたにおすすめ ・レシぽんなどプロ料理だと材料などが家庭的でなくて探せなかった方 ・レシピサーチなどのレシピ検索アプリを使っているけれど、もっと人気の料理から探したい方 ・レシピブログなどに投稿する料理アイデアをさがしたい方 ・レタスクラブ、みんなのきょうの料理、おかずラックラク! 、CHANTO 、オレンジページなどの料理雑誌を購入または愛読している方 ・無料レシピアプリでも人気のレシピを見たい方 ・レシピ一品だけでなく献立で料理をしたい方 ・育児・子育て中で安心してレシピを探したい方 ■料理を探す こちらは無料会員登録をしなくてもお手軽にサクサク利用できる為、気になる料理をすぐ見つけられます♪ ◎カテゴリーで探す 肉のおかず、魚介のおかず、野菜のおかずといった定番カテゴリーから、日本各地・世界各国の料理、目的別項目まで、18種類のカテゴリーから選択できます。 ◎検索上昇ワード どの食品や料理が人気が高いかを上位10位順に記載しているので、今人気の料理がすぐわかります。 ◎最近見たレシピ・お気に入り 過去のあなたが見た料理を確認したり、「お気に入り」として登録できます。 あなたの使いやすいようにフォルダー分けもできます。無料会員登録をするとPCで登録したお気に入りも同期ができ、アプリで登録したお気に入りもPCに登録できます。　 ◎ピックアップ アプリ内でも人気の高いおすすめをピックアップして紹介します。 ■管理する こちらは、無料会員登録をして初めて使える機能です。ご自身が作った料理を投稿したり、編集したりできます。 ◎マイページレポート 自分の登録した料理が確認できます。 「マイレシピを見る」ではあなたの作ったメニューがいつでも見る事が出来ます。 ◎投稿・編集 自分で作ったレシピを投稿したり、編集することが可能です。 ◎つくったよ投稿一覧 他の人が作った料理のお気に入りを自分で登録して管理、編集ができます。料理の投稿で楽天スーパーポイント(1投稿 50ポイント)が貰えます。 ◎つくったよレポート承認 自分の登録したレシピに、つくったよレポートがつくとアプリから承認できます。つくったよレポートの承認で楽天スーパーポイント（1承認 10ポイント）が貰えます。

The rabbits are falling, but you can save them. Touch the rabbits to make them bounce up. Get points by making the rabbits jump into the magic hats or bounce on the clouds. You also get points each time you tap a rabbit. Try to hold as many rabbits in the air at once as you can and make sure they don't fall down. There are also other animals, pandas and penguins, that need your help. Save the pandas from falling down, or save the penguins that are trying their best to stay in the air by flapping their wings. The longer you stay alive the harder the game will get. Compete against your friends and the rest of the world for the highest score with social and global leaderboards. What are you waiting for? Download Falling Rabbits, it’s free. Features: - Endless gameplay - Three different animals (Rabbits, Pandas, Penguins) - Different difficulties - Difficulty increasing over time - Different power-ups (magician hat, bubble, clouds) - Leaderboards Like this game on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/fallingrabbitsgame Follow this game on Twitter: https://twitter.com/FallingRabbitsG

description: Enter a destination or waypoint and get the Bearing (true + magnetic) and Distance using your GPS navigation coordinates. Includes aviation compass w/ADF, robust trip system, VFR sectional map view w/cross track error calculation and offline support, "Nearest Destinations" feature, Custom destinations (add your own!), "track recording" to KML files, fuel calculator & much more! Includes 3740 destinations, w/718 airports in the East Central region of the US (OH, IL, IN, MI & WI) ** Now Available: "Bearing + Distance USA", combining all US versions together, plus Canada, for one low price! **

description: Who loves snow sports? Well in Ski Sim Cartoon you have your choice. Hit the slopes with your choice of character and choice of snow sports equipment. If you love to snowboard, ski, bobsled we have them all covered. Choose which you want and start with the easy level 1. As you progress the level get more difficult with more obstacles in the way. You can jump over them or simply avoid them while going down the 3D ski slope. it's your choice. Can you finish all races and get to the finishing line?
Get the latest league table, fixtures, results, and scores from the English Premier League. No frills... just information.

We all love a snow day. Whether you enjoy being let out of school, sitting by a fire drinking hot chocolate, staring out the window and watching the flakes fall, kids yelling and screaming as they play, or just standing and listening to the serene quit that snow brings. A snow day is a day to play hookie, forget all the stresses of life, hang out with the kids, just have fun... JixiPix's Snow Daze app recreates all these memories directly on your images. Great for creating Christmas cards or adding an artistic touch to an otherwise general photo. As with all JixiPix apps the usage of Snow Daze is super simple and creates amazingly realistic results. Drag and drop you photo into the app and hit the always wonderful Randomize button, tap the “Save Photo” menu and send to family and friends. Snow Daze delivers: •Choose from a light snow fall to a heavy one •Ability to manual remove snow where needed •The ability to fill in the sky with clouds •Loads of presets, to get you started fast •The ability to create personal-favorite custom presets using the "Share" menu •The addictive JixiPix Randomizer – so much fun! •Easy-to-use slider controls to adjust light, contrast and texture just how you want it •Superfast preview mode to immediately see edit results, with large image rendered at save •Works with Hi-Res images for top-quality results •Superior customer support and updates – we're committed to your long-term satisfaction

Can you beat the chalkboard challenge? Drawing a line with your finger is about as simple as it gets, but when you include disappearing obstacles, moving objects and keys to collect you get one seriously tricky puzzle game. Take on the Impossible Line and put your skills to the test. Use your finger to draw a line on the chalkboard and reach the goal while avoiding the obstacles that vanish as soon as you touch the screen. With over 300 levels to tackle, you’ll have to use the radar and useful hint items to make it through each one. Are you up to the challenge? Game Features • Over 300 levels to complete, each with a different unique challenge! • Stuck? Use a hint of an illuminating torchlight to help you out of a jam! • Super casual gameplay with a challenging twist, great for all kinds of gamers!
release_text: Play new levels and help us beat cancer! The Impossible Line has teamed up with Cancer Research UK to introduce new levels that will help in the fight against cancer. Better yet, you’ll earn coins for playing these new levels.

description: MMATorch keeps you up to date with what's happening in the world of Mixed Martial Arts; including interviews, news, and columns on MMA's Top Promotions, such as the UFC, Strikeforce, Bellator, and much more! With an expert staff of reporters and analysts putting you in the middle of the action, get in-depth and behind the scenes news on every major MMA promotion in the world of Mixed Martial Arts today, such as: - UFC - Strikeforce - Bellator - DREAM - MMA News - MMA Events - MMA Analysis - MMA Reviews - Ultimate Fighter Coverage - MMA Interviews - MMA DVD Reviews - and many more MMA promotions!

description: If they don't send you the bills and you have to take readigs of the electricity and water meters by your own self or if you're just curious about your water and electricity consumption and want to reduce your bills - this application is for you. It keeps the readings of your meters along with the water and electricity tariffs in the database and calculates your water and electricity consumption and the amount of money you must pay for water and electricity.
release_text: Export into CSV file has been added. CSV file is a text representation of the data table. It is recognized by many programms, (for example, Microsoft Office Exel) and can be uploaded into computer for further processing. This file can be, also, used as a backup copy of the database. Application creates a CSV file named "Domestic Payments.csv" and puts it into SD card folder named "Download". The bag has been eliminated

In this point and click, room-escape style adventure game, players explore the mysterious home of the famous missing scientist, Doctor Teresa Von Awesome. The doctor's research and inventions uncover puzzles that hold the key to her disappearance. Players search for clues and items as they try to solve the unfolding series of puzzles through nearly one hundred atmospheric environments. - Collect dozens of items and unlock puzzles as you uncover new secrets. - High detail atmospheric imagery and original music. - In Game hints system can be toggled on or off. We hope you come and explore the Mystery on Telescope Hill !

Sixteen years in the future, the zombie apocalypse is bitter reality as a rampant virus turns all it infects into the walking dead. How will you survive on the streets of New Livingston as Deadmen wander in search of living flesh? ◆Staff◆ Producer: Shinichi Tatsuke Battle Design: Hiroyuki Ito Character Design: Akira Oguro Composer: Naoshi Mizuta Story: Yuri Tsuchiya And a horde of world-class illustrators! ◆3-D FPS Hunts◆ The cemetery. The casino. The downtown district. It's open season on zombies all over town. Head out armed with your sniper rifle and an arsenal of other weapons to hunt down the dead. But be careful—they're hunting you, too! ◆Card-Based Battles◆ Braindead Broadcasting proudly presents the Deadman Duels—a television program that pits one zombie horde against another in a gruesome fight to the undeath. Visit the Boneyard and go head-to-head against other players from around the world to climb the global ranks. ◆Taking on Jobs◆ Needy clients from all over New Livingston post jobs at an underground bar called the Last Drop. Take on work from a dazzling damsel in distress, a troubled priest, an ambitious circus master, a hard-core gamer, zealous zombie rights activists, and more, and watch their unique stories unfold. ◆Clan Events◆ Vigilante groups organize willing survivors in an effort to combat the spreading zombie infestation. Work together with other members of your clan to fulfill large-scale mission objectives and earn rewards scaled to your personal contribution. In June of 2030, the United States of America declared a nationwide state of martial law. But in the three months that have passed since then, both the government and media have fallen silent. All that can be heard now from the confines of your apartment are bloodcurdling screams, often followed by the echoes of gunfire and distant moans. You find yourself no longer able to obey the federal order to remain indoors. Driven by hunger, gripped by fear, and armed with your rifle, you unbar the door and step out into the unknown. ***Attention*** * Deadman's Cross requires a constant internet connection. *This game works only on Android version 3.0 and later.

description: ★★New DioDict 4, Quick Search Enabled Electronic Dictionary, Now Available★★ The complete New Ace English-Korean Dictionary • published by Kumsung Publishing, one of the Korea's leading dictionary makers • 310,000 words, meanings and examples • Thousands of notes on grammar and ways to use words • No internet connection needed. * please note that you should re-download native pronunciation in settings when you update DioDict 4 ENG-KOR Dictionary App. **Free upgrade available for DioDict 3 ENG-KOR Dictionary users. DioDict 4 is only compatible with OS versions ICS (Android 4) and above. If your device’s OS is ICS or higher, DioDict 4 will be downloaded and installed. If your device’s OS is lower than ICS, DioDict 3 will be automatically selected for download. If you are using DioDict 3, please note that each version has different functions.** Please check the link below if you have any concerns about the installation and using of DioDict. http://cs.diotek.com/FAQ/EN ==Trusted Dictionary and Continuous Updates Available== • The trusted New Ace Korean-English dictionary is used by Oxford University Press, the world's largest university press! • Continuous updates from Harper Collins' 'New Words' database! • Updated under the supervision of domestic and foreign language institutions and Jeong Yeongguk and Jo Miok, the most respected lexicographers in Korea. =====Contains Rich Content============= • Entries focus on practicality and frequency of use. • A wide range of lexicon including a select 215,000 English-Korean and 95,000 Korean-English entries. • Two way English-Korean dictionary suited to learners of both English and Korean. • Updated to cover the latest vocabulary in Korean and English. • Example Bank available with examples applicable to daily, real-life conversations and compositions. • Pronunciation guide from the built-in American Text To Speech (TTS) solution. • American and British pronunciation guide available for free (download is available via Wi-Fi.) • Various detailed examples essential for English learners provided. ==Powerful & Specialized Functions in Diodict 4== ▶ Easier Search with 'Multi Search' ◀ • When you enter a word to search, relevant sentence idioms and phrasal verbs are searched for and spelling is checked automatically. • Multiple types of searches are available in a single search window without the need to select a search mode. ▶ Search Features ◀ • Wildcard search: enter “?” or “*” in place of a letter when you are unsure of the spelling (e.g., “man*ver” retrieves the word “maneuver”). • Search not only for words, but for phrases or examples. • The spell check function corrects typos - if you are unsure of the spelling or mis-type a word, a list of similar words is offered. • With the Korean-English dictionary, you can quickly search a word by typing the initial consonants of the Korean alphabet. (Example: “ㅅㅈ” “사전”) • The search results are listed in real-time when you enter a keyword. • links to Google so that you can search for more information on a particular word. • If you search for a verb in the English-Korean dictionary, the infinitive is always found whether it's in the present, past, past participle, or future perfect. • DioDict 4 lets you know how many times you have searched for the same word. ▶ Vocab Revision ◀ • History menu lists all your recent word searches. • Save words and expressions to any number of flashcard folders. • You can efficiently learn the words saved in the folders using the Cradle and Yes/No Quizzes function. ■ CS center : support@diotek.com ■ www.facebook.com/DIOTEK

Running Shadow is a unique mix of a parkour game and a fantasy RPG . Simple game mechanics are enriched with a mythical plot full of secrets and intrigue. You take on the role of a fortunate thief and assassin in possession of a unique artifact: the Gauntlet of the Celestial Guardian stolen from the adepts of a dark and ancient cult. Like in classic RPG games, you will be empowered with wondrous and unique abilities. Get ready for a never-ending adventure full of danger: age-old castles, gloomy dungeons and treacherous enemy ambushes, dozens of exciting levels and unique quests. You will need all your experience from running games and all your extreme parkour skills to win. Embark on the path full of danger and win the title of Master Shadow! Key Features: ✔ Intriguing locations in the best traditions of fantasy games: noblemen’s castles, bandit layers, sewers, town prison, and many others ✔ With more than 20 unique characters, including a majestic draconid, an elf and a goblin, the game will keep you playing for hours on end. ✔ More than 8 outfits for the main hero, including swords, armor, and masks ✔ Unique battle system: you fight regular foes with sword, and subdue Nephilims with magic. Can check for yourself this is not your average run and gun game. ✔ Secret elven tricks to learn to overcome obstacles ✔ Special magic abilities to let your character become a shadow, restore his mana, replenish his health and increase his rage while fighting enemies. And, of course, the powerful Gauntlet may as well prove indispensable in battles. ✔ 300 collectible items to be gathered while passing your quests ✔This game works in offline mode without Internet – play it on the plane, in subway or on the road. Enjoy! Discover new titles from Game Insight: http://www.game-insight.com Join our community on Facebook: http://www.fb.com/gameinsight Subscribe to our YouTube channel: http://goo.gl/qRFX2h Read the latest news on Twitter: http://twitter.com/GI_Mobile Follow us on Instagram: http://instagram.com/gameinsight/ Official Page on Facebook:: https://www.facebook.com/RunningShadowGame Privacy Policy: http://www.game-insight.com/en/site/privacypolicy

description: Our Andriod version of PILL IDENTIFIER1.0 has crossed 150000+ downloads!! Now we have Pro version 2.0 of Pill Identifier with addtional features. We have received incredible response for all the apps released so far by us. Healthtap doctors have rated our app Medi-Reminder as #1. Identify those loose pills which you are not sure of, using Pill Identifier App. Get the detailed description of over 10000 medications found in the U.S. against Imprint, Shape and Color. Also determine the pills you are searching for based on Name, Pill Images, Strength, Ingredients, Manufacturer and NDC Code. The images and pill information are provided by Pillbox. Powered by : Pillbox (U.S. National Library of Medicine) HHS has been rapidly advancing a major new Open Government flagship project called the Community Health Data Initiative (CHDI). The Initiative embodies the philosophy of “open data” and data sharing. The core principle is that the government can help trigger enormous public good by implementing the idea of “government as platform”. Supplying greater amounts of high quality, free government data to the public and actively marketing the availability of this data – which can then be turned into useful insights, applications, products, and services by a growing “ecosystem” of private and public sector innovators from across the country, working with engaged consumers, providers, civic leaders, employers, researchers, and others. This is ongoing activity and Pillbox will continue to add new images to its database. Disclaimer: The information given by Pill Identifier is not intended as medical advice or prescription. The information is only to help the user in identifying the medicines based on physical properties. Health5C does not endorse any of the medications listed in the application. Health5C is not responsible for any of the data entered by the user. The data entered by the user is at own risk. By Health5C Wellness Solutions (P) Ltd. < http://www.health5c.com >

description: It is a free version of Phone Bridge providing the same functionality as paid application. If you like it you can donate by buying a paid version Phone Bridge Free simplifies making calls via • Calling card (like callingcards, phonecard, centcalls, cloncom) • Meeting Bridge/ Meeting room Conference • Low cost access numbers (like dialwise) You don’t need to remember your PIN or destination number and re-type it again and again. Just setup calling rules using a simple configuration screen, click Call button and the application will make a call for you using DTMF. A single configuration screen is used in contrast with other calling card applications. The application will also intercept all outgoing calls made using standard dial-pad, check if auto-redirection rules are setup for the number and redirect it via the bridge specified if configured. The application will update calling log, so you will see the real number, not the calling card number. Full control of auto-redirection options is provided. It can be enabled: • Never • for Mobile Operator you been connected to while making configuration • for country you been in while making configuration • or always You can setup calling rules typing in or picking up numbers from contact list. You can also setup wild card rules putting+ at the end of destination number. For instance 35386+ will redirect all calling numbers started with 35386. In case of two different calling cards are specified for the same destination number, then most recently configured rule or matching wild card will be used for redirection. The application will show notification icon and message and also will vibrate a phone if redirection happens. The trial version has the following limitations: • Up to 5 combinations are stored • Up to 3 auto-redirections are supported • 1 auto-redirection of wild card is supported • No support for wild card exceptions • Auto-complete is not supported for numbers Please send any suggestions/requests you may have to sherwood.droid@gmail.com Mini user guide: The top dropdown list contains all combinations sorted by time of last usage or name (Click and hold to change the order). Explanation mark shows that auto-redirect is enabled for the combination. Bridge number can be typed in or picked up from contacts (click and hold to pick up from contacts) PIN can contain P and W in order to specify extra pauses required. P – will stop processing for 2 seconds, W – will wait confirmation from user to continue. Phone – the full number or wildcard can be specified. Put + at the end of number in order to use it as a «startwith»wild card. Use Pause sliders to setup the duration of corresponding pause. 2 seconds are setup by default. Move a slider left to activate manual confirmation. Use check boxes below to define roaming rules for auto-redirection. The rules will be applied taken into account information of operator the rule was created with.
release_text: Don't forget to start the application manually once in order to activate new version It is a free version of Phone Bridge providing the same functionality as paid application. If you like it you can donate by buying a paid version *

description: Com o aplicativo de ZH para smartphones e tablets Android você acessa o conteúdo online de zerohora.com, atualizado 24 horas por dia, sete dias por semana. Com acesso exclusivo, nossos assinantes podem acessar notícias, galerias de foto e ler as últimas 30 edições da versão impressa do principal jornal do Rio Grande do Sul (disponíveis também para compra por não assinantes). Através do Minha ZH, a área de serviços do aplicativo, você pode acessar a previsão do tempo, alertas de trânsito, horóscopo e os últimos resultados da dupla Gre-Nal. Você escolhe quais serviços quer acompanhar e muda a sua área sempre que quiser! Zero Hora foi fundada em 1964 e é o jornal líder em circulação no RS, de acordo com os dados do Instituto Verificador de Circulação. This is a free 7 day trial version of the main MyAV app that can also control main other IP/IR controllable devices. Unofficial MyAV Virgin Media Control App allows you to control your network-connected Virgin Media TiVo® Box from the comfort of your seat using your Android device. Not only this but MyAV can also control a range of other products, Other devices include Blu-ray players, AV Receivers, Lighting. MyAV Virgin Media Control offers virtually the same functionality as your Virgin TiVo® remote, but with the added benefits of a bold, simple, intuitive design and direct access to channels. It has been designed for all ages and for ease of use, with large channel icons, which mean it is easier than ever to choose whatever channel you want. Your Virgin TiVo® box must be connected to your router/hub via Ethernet for this app to work. You will also need to enable “network remote” in the TiVo® settings menu (You may have to disable and the re-enable this setting). For best results, specify a fixed IP on your TiVo® box before installing this app. The VM TiVo box can only accept one connection at a time, so only run this app on one Android device at a time. Features include: -Easy connect to your Virgin box, no manual IP entry needed! -Bold interface with bright icons that make browsing channels a breeze -Delete unwanted channels quickly and easily -Channel filters to easily find the desired channel -Hold down, then drag and drop your favourite channels into a favourites folder. -Use your Android keyboard to search the guide and YouTube more easily. -TV & Blu-Ray control

description: Discover community poems and poetry and write your own with the social network for Poets! Vote and comment on the poems of the members to elect the best poets of the day, week and month! ★★★ Social Application for Poetry ★★★ You'll love this app even if you can't stand poetry! ✓ Browse all Community poems ✓ Share them on Facebook and Twitter ✓ Vote and comment on each poem and poetry ✓ Add friends and easily find their poems ✓ Search by categories or keywords in a poem ✓ This is a Waluu App of the Waluu.com network :) Here are the most common categories in this application that can be used for better organization ✓ Positive Feelings: Love, Desire, Enjoyment, Sincerity, Happiness, Solidarity, ✓ Negative Feelings: Sadness, Jealousy, Infidelity, Anger, Hate, Fear, Spleen Despair ✓ Family: Brother, Sister, Mom, Dad, Child, Grandmother, Grandfather, ✓ Life: Birth, Couple, Marriage, Death, Religion, ✓ Miscellaneous: Erotism, Humor, Prose, Animals, Birthday, First Name, Letter Acrostic ✓ Known: Duo, Fantasy, Fanatic, Open letters, Nature, First Name, Surrealism ✓ More: Rant, Ecology, Tribute, Sports, Pregnancy, Dedication, Friend, Weekend, Romantic, Christmas, Relaxation, Vacations, Flowers, Passion, Valentine's Day ★ Poems ★ "I know what seeing is! As I saw you that day for the first time So I know what liking is! I know what striking is! As I stroke stone against stone So I know what the spark is! I know what rubbing is! As I rubbed heart against heart So I know what love is! I know what caring is! As I had been used to it since we met So I know what soft touch is! I know what fire is! As I had been burning along with you So I know what nectar is! I know what compassion is! As I have experienced it with you So I know what affection is! I know what addiction is! As I have been addicted to the smell of you So I know what obsession is! I know what memory is! As I have experienced the break up So I know what the hurt is! I know what mistake is! As I have been the victim of misjudgement So I know what reconciliation is! I know what longing is! As I have suffered from emptiness So I know what she is! I know what losing is! As I have lost in the rough wind So I know what I miss!" ★ Definitions ★ Poetry is an ancient genre which can adopt various styles. It is usually written in verse -although prose is also acceptable- and favors the expressiveness of form over substance. Its definition proves difficult and varies over time. In fact, its function and expression evolves and changes with centuries and individual poets. The word "poetry" comes from the Greek "poiein", which means "to make, to create". As such, the poet is a creator, an inventor of expressive forms, which is perfectly illustrated by the Middle Ages terms “minstrel” and “troubadour”. The poet, heir to a long oral tradition, emphasizes musicality and rhythm, leading to the use of a verse form in most poetic texts to make language more convoluted. ★ Quotes ★ "No poem can be as great, noble, and truly worthy of the name of the poem as those written solely for the pleasure of writing a poem." "Good poetry teaches, conveys ethical principles and serves a purpose." "Every poem is a treasure of feelings." "The poem, this extended hesitation between sound and sense." "Poetry is a religion without hope." Here are the keywords describing this application: Poem, Poems, Poetry, Balad, Heart, Love, Friend, Friendship, Letter, Kiss, Hugs and Kisses, Lyric, Lyrics, Slam, Poetry, Quotations and Proverbs.

This is the Pro version of IELTS Vocabulary. Here're the highlights: - About 8500 words (4000 more than the lite version) - No ads IELTS, or International English Language Testing System, is an international standardized test of English language proficiency. There are two versions of the IELTS: the Academic Version and the General Training Version: - The Academic Version is intended for those who want to enroll in universities and other institutions of higher education and for professionals such as medical doctors and nurses who want to study or practice in an English-speaking country. - The General Training Version is intended for those planning to undertake non-academic training or to gain work experience, or for immigration purposes. IELTS is accepted by most Australian, British, Canadian, Irish, New Zealand and South African academic institutions, over 3,000 academic institutions in the United States, and various professional organizations. It is also a requirement for immigration to Australia and New Zealand. In Canada, IELTS, TEF, or CELPIP are accepted by the immigration authority. Being able to use a rich vocabulary is a major advantage in the IELTS and will certainly help you get a higher score. It will also be beneficial in your academic, personal and professional life. This IELTS Vocabulary Pro app will help you achieve your goal more efficiently: - The database contains a list of about 8500 IELTS words with pronunciation and a brief definition. - It uses 3 different approaches (Word List, Flashcard and Quiz) to fit in different students’ study habits. - You may mark the words that you’re not familiar with and review only those marked words in Flashcard mode. - It tracks your progress and results for all quizzes you take. Be better prepared!

Live Weather Plus provides weather forecast around the world. Live Weather Plus comes with an elegant and intuitive user interface that displays current weather data like temperature or current conditions and also forecasts with charts for high and max temperature. /!\ Live Weather Plus is updated in version 3.0 with new interface following Android 4x guidelines and more efficiency to display meteo data. Give it a try ! /!\ Live Weather Plus provides an unique feature that lets you to see world map with cities, continents map or countries map ! Live Weather’s data are available and updated 24h/24 and 7days/7. === FEATURES === More than 100000 locations all around the world. Current conditions for locations (Temperature, Conditions Icon and Text, Humidity, Wind). Sunrise and sunset for each cities in local hours of city. Current date of city which data are displayed. Conditions Icon are adapted with sunrise / sunset informations (so moon is displayed when sunset Is finished). Forecasts for the next 4 days displayed in charts with high and max temperatures. GPS localization of your current city to display current meteo. Save your favorite cities in a list. Display favorite cities in a world map. Display continents map with weather for main cities of each (Africa, America, Asia, Europa, Oceania). Display countries map with weather of main cities of each (More than 20 countries supported for the moment with Argentina, Austria, Belgium, Brazil, Canada, China, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, India, Italy, Ireland, Japan, Netherland, Romania, Russia, South Korea, Spain, Switzerland, United Kingdom, USA) For each cities in map you can display temperature, icon conditions or wind conditions. History data like cities with hottest and coldest temperatures in the world. Display charts with average temperature by month of main cities in the world (others are added very often). Help screen describing main data displayed by Live Weather Plus (You must slide to the right or left to change help data displayed). Share city’s weather of your choice by email, SMS or via social network thanks to a generated image representing weather data. Listen city’s weather in your current language. Customize user interface. Select temperature unit (°Celsius or °Farenheit). 3 widgets (4x1 simple widget with current city and temperature, 4x2 forecasts widget and 4x2 clock widget with current city data). === LOCALIZATION === Live Weather Plus supports English, German, French, Spannish and Italia. If you want translate Live Weather Plus to another language, don’t hesitate to contact me ( sylvain.saurel@gmail.com ). === FEATURES SUGGEST === If you want to see new features in Live Weather Plus or new countries map for example, feel free to contact me also. I will try to add these features to improve Live Weather Plus for all.

Anatomy Study Guide – America’s Navy DESCRIPTION: This FREE human anatomy app includes 11 systems of the human body, with quizzing, sharing and rotating capabilities. It allows the user to do a range of tasks: *Tap on each body part for its name *Zoom in on specific body parts*Test knowledge of anatomy*Keep notes for future reference*Share notes with friends and classmates USES: This guide to human anatomy is designed for medical students. But it’s also a useful tool for any student of human anatomy – high school, college or medical school. It can also be used by medical professionals, doctors and nurses as a quick educational reference to show patients and students. FEATURES: *3-D MODELS: All images on the app are three-dimensional and include rotational models of the muscular system, vascular system, heart, skeletal system, skull and brain.*QUIZZES: Choose whether to put the app in quiz mode or learning mode. *EASY NAVIGATION: Quick use of the navigational tools includes flip-page tool, fast reset button and on-screen index for easy access at all times.*HIGHLIGHTING: Highlight the area you are working on, such as muscles, bones, organs or systems. *HIGH-RESOLUTION IMAGES: Tap and pinch to zoom; check out anterior and posterior views; and rotate, turn and flip images to see all sides of the area you’re studying.*FREE: All content is FREE – you’ll never be charged for additional systems or images. All thanks to America’s Navy! CONTENTS: Muscular System, Vascular System, Heart, Skeletal System, Skull, Brain, Functional Areas of the Brain, Digestive System, Brachial Plexus, Clotting Cascade, Male and Female Dermatome Maps, and Respiratory System.

description: World Rally Racing, is a rally series featuring new graphics, audio, physics engine, new vehicles and a new game engine. Drive for your team in an exciting racing series spanning the globe and culminating with a champion driver and manufacturer victory. The driver's world championship and manufacturer's world championship are similar events which will challenge your driving skill in a mix of pure arcade cart racing action and World Rally Championship / Global RallyCross Championship style events. World Rally Racing Features: •Stunning detailed 3D modeled rally cars and racetrack environments using Unity 3D game engine •Beautiful High Resolution Graphics for Retina Resolutions •10 progressive racing arenas •5 Varied Race Car levels •4 Upgrade options for all cars (Brake, Accelerate, Engine, Tires) •Online leaderboards with Fastest Lap points (coming soon) •Over 100 customizable character options including: •Brakes •Accelerate •Engine •Tires •Unique Driver death game play that accounts for car on car collision •Special Abilities Boost packs both Speed , Health and Shield based •20 Different Professional Custom Rally Cars Using a limited pool of drivers and team race cars, you must compete in a series of racing venues and events while maintaining your race team and improving your team vehicle. By winning races and earning money the player is able to purchase cars and liveries (skins) for the cars. The amount of money earned is based on the difficulty level picked by the player when selecting the event; higher difficulty levels have more challenging AI opponents and more realistic damage effects. Completed events can be repeated at any time, although unless challenged at a higher difficulty level, the player will earn significantly less money than when they first raced it. Try to keep your race clean and finish in the lead with as little damage as possible to your car.
release_text: Removed all ads Reduced cash cost for unlocked cars

To follow an app from the Play Store, Steam, PSN, Xbox, GOG or Origin website, use the "share" button and select "best app sale" to open the page of this app on best app sale. You will find the follow button and the price history. You can also use the search function. Other functionalities - Sort by date of discount, popularity, discount, release date - You can choose the country (thus the currency) and the language of the store - You can see ended sales - Share the sales to your friends - Nearly all apps and game are available in best app sale ! All the best price cut, price reduction are available in the app. You will miss no deals, no game or app that is on sale. Best App Sale will be the best friend of your wallet, for the best app on sales but also for the best games on sale. If you would like to buy a package of multiple games for a really low price, the functionnality to list the bundles of games will let you buy multiples games for as low as 1$ (by example) ! The in-app purchase is for removing the ads

description: Перед вами одно из воплощений советского прошлого. В эпоху, когда телевизоров ещё не было или они являлись причудливой экзотикой, когда о сложных технических устройствах читали в специализированных журналах или фантастических рассказах, а о главных новостях узнавали по радио, уже существовали диафильмы. Прозрачные 35-мм перфорированные фотокиноплёнки с изготовленными на них позитивными изображениями бережно хранились, а когда подключался диапроектор, и на белую простыню падал яркий свет, невзрачные коробочки с плёнкой становились воистину волшебными.... Лекции, учебные материалы, художественные произведения, сказки для детей и рассказы по мотивам любимых мультфильмов - всего более 3500 диафильмов было выпущено в СССР. У вас есть возможность поближе познакомиться с наследием прошлого или вернуться в детство, даже если у вас нет фильмоскопа. Это официальное приложение студии “Диафильм” (ЗАО "Киноальянс), которое можно установить на любое мобильное устройство, поддерживающее OS Android. Часть диафильмов в приложении доступна бесплатно, остальные можно приобрести за символическую плату 0.99$ (в СССР коробочка с заветной плёнкой стоила 35-50 копеек). Мы постоянно пополняем коллекцию диафильмов, следите за обновлениями. Также у нас есть версия для iOS (iPhone/iPad/iPod), которую можно найти и скачать в Apple AppStore. Приложение для iOS назывется "Мир диафильмов". На данный момент доступно 111 диафильмов: Пряничный домик Авдотья-Рязаночка Аленький цветочек Аля, Кляксич и буква А. Андромеда Белый клык Бычок - черный бочок, белые копытца Гаргантюа и Пантагрюэль. 2 части Госпожа Метелица Гулливер в стране лилипутов (1966) Гулливер в стране лилипутов (1989) Дюймовочка Жареная кукуруза Злая волшебница Бастинда Игрушки Из жизни Дон Кихота Ламанчского. Карлик Нос Катигорошек Кот в сапогах (1965) Кот в сапогах (цветной) Крокодил Гена и его друзья Крошка Енот и тот, кто сидит в пруду Кувшин с золотом Маленькая Баба-Яга Маленький Мук (1965 год) Маленький Мук (1981 год) Мальчик с пальчик Мама для мамонтенка Мамин день Медвежонок Паддингтон у моря Морозко Муми-Тролль в джунглях Муми-Тролль и комета Муфта, Полботинка и Моховая Борода Новый наряд короля Об одной непослушной ноге Огниво Однажды Остров сокровищ Пастух, который тысячу зайцев пас Пестрая лента Приключения Буратино Приключения доисторического мальчика Приключение Эмиля из Леннеберги, или как Эмиль угодил головой в супницу Принц и нищий Принцесса на горошине Проделки братца Кролика Путешествие в Страну Обезьян (Доктор Айболит и его звери) Путешествие в страну Обезьян (В Африке) Рикки-Тикки-Тави Робин Гуд Сестрица Аленушка и братец Иванушка Сказка о Попе и работнике его Балде Сказка про трех пиратов Сказки дядюшки Римуса Смоляной бычок Снежная королева Сороконожки Союз рыжих Станция Луна Стойкий оловянный солдатик Счастливый Ганс Урфин Джюс и его деревянные солдаты Халиф-Аист Царевна-лягушка Чипполино Щелкунчик Вороны Ут-Реста Два плута Капитан Тин Тиныч Here is one of the incarnations of the Soviet past. In an era when there was no TV or they were the bizarre exotic when about complex technical devices read in specialized magazines or fiction stories, and learned about the main news on the radio already existed filmstrips. Transparent 35mm perforated fotokinoplenki with custom them positive images were carefully kept, and when connected slide projector and a white sheet exposed to bright light, inconspicuous boxes with film becomes truly magical .... Lectures, training materials, works of art, fairy tales and stories for children based on their favorite cartoons - over 3500 filmstrips were produced in the USSR. You have the opportunity to explore the legacy of the past, or to return to childhood, even if you do not filmoskop. This is the official app studio "filmstrip" (JSC "Kinoalyans), which can be installed on any mobile device that supports OS Android. Filmstrips Part annex available for free, others can be purchased for a nominal fee $ 0.99 (in the USSR box with treasured film cost 35 - 50 kopecks). We are constantly growing collection of slides, stay tuned. We also have a version for iOS (iPhone / iPad / iPod), which can be found and downloaded in the Apple AppStore. IOS app nazyvetsya "World filmstrips." Currently available 111 filmstrips: Gingerbread House Avdotia-Ryazanochka The Scarlet Flower Alya Klyaksich and letter A. description: This game app challenges you to move a swimmer through a dynamic and exciting obstacle course. The objective is to score as many points as possible by catching fish while avoiding boats and alligators trying to stop you. The App challenges you to strike a balance between trying to maximize points earned by catching fish versus minimizing risk by exposing the swimmer to attack by speedboats and alligators. Points are added each time a fish is hit by the swimmer and when the swimmer arrives at a safe island end point. The initial app version is free without advertising, but advertising will be added to the app in the near future. keywords: swimming, crashes, smashes, obstacles, boats, fish, crocodiles, monkeys
release_text: Refined: Monkey on island throws out an energy booster banana which can give the swimmer a brief burst of speed.

The QLL audio bilingual storybook is getting better now. 1. the picture is higher resolution 2. simple and support more language user interface 3. Find it! (A treasure word hunt game) - for tablet only This is an audio storybook. Immerse yourself in rich language and easily learn Chinese/English, in an entertaining way. You and your child are picking up another language while having quality time together, becoming bilingual, simply by having story time on a regular basis. Just by reading a story. Sometimes, you do the reading, sometimes you both take turns. You used to switch the voice reading on and let the program tell you the story but you don’t need it anymore because you’re learning fast. Storytelling is one of the most enjoyable and effective techniques to learn a new language. If you’ve been hoping for a fast, fun way to learn Chinese/English, you only have to download Find it! Do it right now and you can begin to pick up another language as soon as today! Find it! is a word hunting game. Find and click objects hidden in the pictures. It's an addictive game with stylish artworks. Easy to start, but hard to master.

You can post any ideas on our page: https://www.facebook.com/VardamirsGameStudio In the Cyber Fighter: Arcade Game you are to take a fighter under control and set off to the cyberspace. We bring two game modes to your attention: Arcade and Hard. You are to battle with six different bosses in the Arcade mode where simple enemies can be killed with one hit. There is also a possibility to replenish the number of lives just scoring a certain amount of points. If you find the Arcade mode too easy or you have already finished it so it’s just the time to try the Hard mode. You can save up Credits (currency) for the purchase of new fighters in the Hard mode. In this mode you will find six fighters with different damage and durability. You will make sure you will not be able to kill simple enemies with one hit since they become much stronger. Don’t expect that you will succeed in passing Cyber Fighter: Arcade Game at one push up to the end. To save up Credits for a new fighter, you will have to replay this game more than once. The better fighter you receive the easier it will be to pass the game. The Cyber Fighter: Arcade Game is made in a particular graphics and audio style, which can help you to refresh your memory of those times that you spent in the front of arcade machines. If it was before your time but you like good old retro games then you should definitely try Cyber Fighter: Arcade Game.
release_text: Version 1.02a Reworked all textures for fighters Version 1.02 The number of lives increased from 3 to 7 in arcade mode Increasing of level duration in arcade mode Rate of fire is added for fighters in hard mode Added bonuses to pick up while playing Version 1.01b Added Pause Menu Version 1.01a Fixed a bug with the on/off sound Version 1.01 Fixed a bug with the impossibility of obtaining credits in hard mode Version 1.0 Release!

Play Minesweeper, the age-old game of strategy where you race to clear a virtual minefield without tripping over mines. Game features include an advanced board generator that prevents you from losing on your first move, high scores to keep track of your fastest games, and three standard difficulties, as well as a unique challenge difficulty where you are not allowed to flag mines. Watch your step, it's a war out there!
release_text: 1.1.3 (9/3/2012) - Upon losing the game, all mines are now visible and any incorrect flag is marked - Added some gradients along the edges to indicate that the board continues off screen in that direction - Small performance improvements

description: StickyShortcut creates a shortcut which remains on home when target application is deleted. When a shortcut of which target application is unintalled is opened, StickyShortcut will open Market page of target application. StickyShortcut is useful under the following situations. ・if you uninstall developing application to switch debug signed version and release signed version. ・if you temporarily uninstall some applications to make larger free space on internal storage. ・if you use a home application which deletes shortcut which target is on SD when SD is unmounted(Home of Galaxy S, Galaxy Tab). Usage is shown by launching application.

Camera Master Pro is an easy-to-use camera app with many features integrated. Features include: ● Multiple real-time camera filters. ● Quick exposure adjustment. ● Flash modes settings. ● Different scene modes supported. ● Support different picture sizes which could be picked by users. ● Picture quality settings. ● Focus mode settings. ● Camera timer / countdown. ● Support both front & back camera ● Built-in photo editor with many functionalities such as effects, frames, contrast, brightness and saturation etc.

Have you ever wondered what it would be like to be a Penguin? Come and explore the world as a Penguin. Take him to the Beach or let him swim around some icebergs. Make him happy by accomplishing all the objectives. He moves his feet and swims like a real penguin. Highlights: --Control a funny 3D Penguin --4 Fun and Interactive 3D Maps to Explore - Loads of Effects and Secrets --SHARKS! Lots of Sharks are out to get your Penguin. Swim fast! --Seagulls, People, Goats,Bears, Horses --Super Fun Music --Excellent 3D Graphics and Exciting 3D Penguin Gameplay --Loads of Achievements --Break some crystals, Smash some tables and chairs --Plenty of fun sounds and visual effects *Note* This app works best on quad core devices** Play the Ice and Snow level or the fun Beach levels. You've played Shark Simulator, Wolf Simulator, Bear Simulator, and Goat Simulator, and Dinosaur Simulator. Now see what it feels like to swim like a Penguin. When your penguin enters the water, we careful of the sharks below. If your penguin hits them, they will cause him damage. Too much damage from the sharks, and your penguin will need to rest a while. Say hello to some friendly birds as you walk around the maps. Bump into the horses. Watch out for the Bears though . . .they are not friendly. Be sure and look around in all the corners and uncover all the map secrets. We love these funny birds and we had a great time creating this app. Hopefully you will have a fun time playing it. . . it's 3D magic! Straight from Antarctica to your mobile device.

Tap on a gate to open or close it. 2. Cross the denoted number of cars within the allotted time. 3. Do not get hit by the train. . . . We are one of the largest practices in the Midwest, with a complete system to help ensure you can see well for life. From simple eye exams to complex surgery using the very latest technology, it's all here: ophthalmologists, optometrists and opticians-all under one roof-and ready to serve you. In fact, we've been serving the Metro East and Southern Illinois for more than 30 years. Today, we have more than 15 locations throughout Southern Illinois. Our practice is owned and operated by Medical Doctor Ophthalmologists who live in Illinois. And, we're dedicated to leading the way with the latest advancements for helping people see clearly. For example, we were the first in the area with micro incision, no stitch cataract surgery and laser vision correction. And we continue to lead the way, being the first in the St. Louis Metro Area with LenSx, laser assisted cataract surgery, and the FS 200/Wavelight laser for advanced bladeless Lasik. Illinois Eye Surgeons is also proud to be the Preferred Eyecare Providers for SIUE Cougar Athletics and the Gateway Grizzlies.

This night clock will easily set all the settings you usually set manually before you go to sleep / take a nap. This bedtime clock will both act as a talking night clock and as a simple one click night profile setter for your convenience. Full features: * Shake or tap the screen twice to hear the time read out to you! * Set Airplane mode * Set whitelisted numbers (only these will ring. All others will remain silent) * Set vibrate / silent modes * Turn off Wi-Fi * Dimmed clock on-screen * Customize brightness of screen and colors of the night clock * Customize night clock volume You can use this nightstand app both as a talking clock and a night profile setter. We sure hope this night profile app will make you sleep much better and save you time before going to sleep. Have a great night! If you like this night clock, please be kind and leave us a good rating and review right here (after you download, just come back here). For any feedback, suggestions, bug reports or questions about "Night Mode", please feel free to contact us at incrediapp.help@gmail.com Thank you very much! This is a 72 hours trial version to enjoy the features offered by Night Mode. After 72 hours from first use, the app will disable itself.
release_text: V 4.02 Fixed a lot of issues with Android 4.3 Enlarged clock size! V 4.00 1) Make sure the lock screen doesn't come up 2) Added options to remove AM/PM and Seconds from the clock V 3.00 Turn off buttons backlight when entering Night Mode V 2.00 - Lots of changes, as requested by our users: * Allow portrait orientation * Allow to keep screen on * Seperate silencing of ringer and notifications * Option to resize clock * Added notification when night mode is active for easy cancellation

description: Try out a new love calculator game for couples! Test your love by using a fingerprint scanner and you'll get your compatibility results in a second. Who's your true match? What's your love percentage? Find out by downloading free ❧Love Calculator Scanner Test❧ app that will entertain you at any moment! ♥Check how much your beloved cares about you by downloading this simple and easy to use love calculator test! ♥Enter your names, your birthdays and put your fingertips on the scanner – the biometric fingerprint reader will show your love percentage in a second! ♥See if you make a perfect match or not! ♥Get this free compatibility test and have fun with your loving one, your friends, relatives or family members whenever you wish! You're searching for a quick and easy love game to kill time and have instant fun with your loving ones at any time and any place? You want to measure your level of love and romance and to see if the scanner test will predict a bright and happy future for you and your partner? Finding that out has never been so easy! Doctor Love has made a great invention just for the lonely you! All you have to do is download this free calculator game with fingerprint scanners and see if the two of you make a good couple match. If you like dating games, compatibility tests or match maker games, you will definitely be thrilled with this free game application. Regardless of your relationship status, whether you're in a happy relationship or not, you can always use this compatibility test to calculate the chance on a successful relationship between you and the person you have crush upon. The Love Calculator is a free app which calculates affinity between two individuals based on their names, birthdays and fingerprints. This love meter finds the love percentage between you and your partner. Love Calculator is not a serious love test or a match maker tool. Based on a fingerprint scanner this free game performs a compatibility test of two people and is mostly for entertainment purposes. Download this unique ❧Love Calculator Scanner Test❧ and calculate whether or not your crush likes you back. A totally free app, absolutely fun and so easy to use! First enter your full name and date of birth; do the same for your partner; place your fingertips on the scanner and wait for the results. The love meter will show your percentage results in a second. Additionally, you can use this excellent “fingerprint scanner” to have fun with your friends, relatives or family members. A nice free app to kill time during the waiting periods, at parties – this finger print game is bound to give you loads of fun any time. You can use it even as a marriage test and check the level of compatibility with your spouse. Download now and play a love game for Android™ whenever you wish!

app_name: Jリーグ海外サッカーニュース速報FootballStream
description: サッカーファンの開発者が、サッカーファンのために作ってます！ 多くのサッカーファンに利用されている、No.1サッカーアプリ！ ★☆★☆★☆★☆★☆★☆ 【シリーズ累計50万DL！】 【Android版 スポーツ無料カテゴリ１位！】 【iPhone版 スポーツ無料カテゴリ１位！】 【OCTOBA/EXドロイド/アンドロナビなど、各メディア掲載実績】 サッカーニュース/試合速報アプリの決定版 ★☆★☆★☆★☆★☆★☆ 【レビューの声】 「毎日チェック、いや毎時チェックしてます！」 「結果も見やすく理想的なアプリでした」 「サッカー好きの友達にも自信を持って薦められる！」 「チームも選択できて見やすくて重宝しています(*^^*) 」 ---- FootballStreamは、サッカーニュース／試合速報アプリケーションです。 シリーズ累計50万DLを突破。多くの方にご利用いただいております。ありがとうございます。 最新の各種メディアニュース／コラムなどを、手元でチェックする事ができます。 Ｊリーグから欧州サッカーまで、さまざまなサッカーに関する情報をお届けします。 また、Ｊリーグ／海外の試合速報も確認することができます。 　「試合のある週末の予習に。」 　「スタジアムへ向かう途中に。」 　「キックオフまでの待ち時間に。」 　「試合終了後の寸評の確認に。」 　「サッカー仲間との飲み会でのお供に。」 　　〜　no football, no life. 〜 【主な機能】 　●サッカー情報の購読 　　- ニュース（主に日本メディア） 　　- 海外発　（主に欧州サッカーニュース） 　　- Ｊリーグ（J'sGOALなどＪリーグ特化メディア） 　　- コラム　（各種サッカーコラム） 　　- 話題　　（タレコミ、はてなブックマークなど） 　　- 2ch系　 （まとめサイトなど2ch転載） 　　※マイチーム機能で、応援するクラブのニュースが探しやすくなりました。 　●サッカー試合速報（Ｊリーグ） 　●サッカー試合速報（海外リーグ） 　●テレビ番組表 　●更新情報／アプリ基本情報 ※まれにニュース表示に時間のかかる場合がありますが、 　利用されている端末の通信状態の影響や、 　ニュース配信元のサーバの問題の可能性があります。 ※本アプリの各機能は、一般的なブラウザやRSSリーダーと同等のものです。 　それぞれの内容は各サイトに直接アクセスして表示しており、再利用・加工等は行っておりません。 　表示の遅延や広告の多重表示などについては、配信元サイトのためにもご了承ください。
release_text: --- 4.6.10, 4.6.11 --- ★軽微なバグを修正しました --- 4.6.9 --- ★ニュースや速報の表示を、大幅に改善しました！ ★アイコンを修正しました --- 4.6.8 --- ★数件のバグを修正しました ★マイチーム機能の選手・チームの追加を行いました ※ニュース更新の不具合は、すでに解消されています。 ※起動時に再起動を求められることがありますがエラーではありません。

description: This is the first release in a new mobile version of the PC series Modern Campaigns. This first release covers the historical North Vietnamese offensive in the Quang Tri province in the spring of 1972. 14 scenarios are included of which you play 9 as the commander of the North Vietnamese forces while in the other 5 scenarios you are commander of a hypothetical US Marine force sent to assist the South Vietnamese. Following this free release, there will be additional releases in this series each representing a smaller mobile version of the corresponding PC game. Modern Campaigns is a detailed turn-based simulation of operational warfare after World War II through present day. It includes detailed rules and combat resolution but has a simple interface that allows the player to focus on strategy and tactics. A wide variety of unit types are represented including infantry, tanks, artillery, and engineers. In addition, modern warfare is addressed in this game engine including chemical and nuclear warfare, electronic warfare (signal intelligence and jamming), and thermal sights. While this version of Modern Campaigns will run on large-format Android phones, it is best on an Android tablet with screen size of 7 inches or more.

Convert Units allows users to use natural (human-readable) language to perform unit conversions and math operations. For example, entering: "45 yd in cm" will request a conversion of 45 yards into centimeters. More examples: "14 gal in oz" "5 kilowatts * 4 hours" "14 m^2 / 2 yd in mi" Uses the Google Search API back-end.

PreseMT is a multitouch presentation maker. It's currently very basic, but you can: * add text and image on an infinite rotate/scalable plane * create slide/snapshot of the current view Then, you can play your presentation and control the plane and slides with some buttons. This is a beta version of the tool, using Kivy project. You need OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware minimum. It run faster on tablet than phone. This application is done by Mathieu Virbel and Christopher Denter.
release_text: Upgrade to Kivy 1.0.7 + settings ui for Kivy

description: Lines Strategy Game - Match 5 online (Colored Lines) Addicting Puzzle Games. A completely free game. Move 5+ same-color balls into one line, you get points. It's easy to play, but definitely difficult to get high scores. You need intelligence and fortune. This strategy Game will make you think and concentrate for hours if you accept the challenge. The game will randomly place three color balls on the game board at every round, you have to strategically select one ball (click on ball) and move it to the most convenient location (click on target square). Lines game or balls online is a clone of a famous Russian board game which was played in almost every PC - equipped office in the 90 - 92. Now it's a flash game designed to help you overcome cubicle boredom. You can submit score to ScoreLoop. Post to your social connections: Twitter, MySpace, Facebook. Language Support: English, Chinese, Japanese, German, Russian and even more. More information: ======================================================================= Youd found the most awesome brain game in apps. Good background music, buzz mode when touch the color ball. You can share your score with your friends via email : hotmail, yahoo mail. Notice that app runs on your phone at landscape mode layout to ensure good user interface. Scoreloop is integrated, you can chat with your friend or send them a message even with emoji or smileys. We keep update with more intractive features. Do try play it, compete with other internet users, to see if you are devil. You need lucky, but a horoscope can't help. Use your intelligence. Maybe a little difficult for children, but still it is a good kids game.
release_text: + Added "Move to SD card" + Fixed an exception bug. + Full support of HD phone and Tablets
